mdRecord.dcterms:description: One graffiti seems to proclaim a socialist identity,to which another graffiti responds with a criticism. Also, graffiti saying "Me Too" may be in agreement with socialist graffiti, or reference to Me Too movement. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Politics
Socialism
Social movements
